name.ja: <ruby>原<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>石<rt>せき</rt></ruby>の<ruby>穿<rt>せん</rt></ruby><ruby>光<rt>こう</rt></ruby>

text.en: Reveal 1 Normal Monster or "Primoredial" card in your hand, except "Primoredial Schiller", then target 1 face-up card on the field (if you control a Normal Monster or a Level 5 or higher "Primoredial" monster, except a Token, you do not have to reveal a card); negate its effects, and if you do, banish it. During your Main Phase, if you control a "Primoredial" monster: You can Set this card from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Primoredial Schiller" once per turn.
